abstract: The phone carrier is matching Verizon and T-Mobile in offering free wireless calls to five preset numbers for its $60-a-month plan.
snippet: The phone carrier is matching Verizon and T-Mobile in offering free wireless calls to five preset numbers for its $60-a-month plan.
lead_paragraph: AT&T today copied other wireless carriers’ promotions and is giving customers on its higher-priced calling plans free calls to five numbers of their choosing.

abstract: A technology called High Speed Packet Access 7.2 is scheduled for installation in 25 cities by the end of 2010.
snippet: A technology called High Speed Packet Access 7.2 is scheduled for installation in 25 cities by the end of 2010.
lead_paragraph: AT&T said on Wednesday that it would make improvements that would double the speed of its wireless network in six cities  Chicago, Dallas, Houston, Los Angeles, Miami and Charlotte, N.C.  by the end of the year.

headline.main: AT&T to Speed Its Network in 6 Cities by Year-End
headline.print_headline: Faster AT&T In 6 Cities By Year-End
